page.title: 04Outdoor Pursuits,Alrewas.
page.content: The only form of educational activity in this area takes place at Alrewas Outdoor Pursuits Centre. This opened in 1980 in the old primary school building dated 1885. The county council rents the buildings from the church. The centre offers many activities for Staffordshire children aged 5-18. Canoeing, Church Studies, campcraft, mapwork, walking are avail- able. There is one main classroom and two dormitories sleeping 20 pupils and one teacher each. There are tents for another 40, two to a tent. There is a kitchen, drying room workshop, store- room and various washing and toilet facilities. Two mini-buses are based there. There are 4 teachers at the centre and an extra canoe instructor in the summer. The centre is open all year except school holidays and week- ends. It has 5 cooks and a caretaker.
